argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | posi.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | posi.l | |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) |
| 3 |  | #P_posprs | |- ( K e. Poset -> K e. Preset ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_prsref | |- ( ( K e. Preset /\ X e. B ) -> X .<_ X ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ X e. B ) -> X .<_ X ) |
